pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, June 1, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

 Burnaby, British Columbia  

 1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Burnaby, Mike Hurley, and leadership from the Burnaby Fire Department.

                   Closed to media

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Hats Off Day.

 East Hastings Street from Boundary Road to Gamma Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive at the north-east corner of East Hastings Street and Carleton Avenue no later than 1:30 p.m.
  • Please note parking is limited due to road closures.
